senses.de: The action or process of making something ready
senses.ex: The preparation of the meal took two hours

Tips.title: Action-Oriented
Tips.description: Emphasizes the active process of getting something ready, often involving physical or mental tasks.
Tips.example: Months of preparation were necessary for the expedition.

Tips.title: Duration Indication
Tips.description: Can suggest the length of time spent on getting ready, which might be short or extended.
Tips.example: Olympians undergo years of preparation before competing.

Tips.title: Result-Focused
Tips.description: Suggests that the outcome is dependent on the quality and thoroughness of preparation.
Tips.example: Her thorough preparation resulted in a flawless presentation.

senses.de: A substance especially made for a specific use
senses.ex: He applied a preparation to stop the bleeding

Tips.title: Specific Use
Tips.description: Highlights that the preparation is specialized for a particular task or condition – not generic.
Tips.example: The laboratory created a preparation for the unique bacterial strain.

Tips.title: Medical Context
Tips.description: Used in a medical setting, it refers to specially formulated treatments or medicines.
Tips.example: The nurse applied an antiseptic preparation to the wound.

Tips.title: Professional Terms
Tips.description: This use is more technical and common among medical professionals.
Tips.example: The pharmacist explained the benefits of each preparation.

senses.de: Studying or training done for an upcoming activity or event
senses.ex: He's in preparation for the marathon next month

Tips.title: Event-Oriented
Tips.description: Relates to getting ready for specific events, emphasizing targeted activities or study.
Tips.example: His preparation for the debate involved researching various topics.

Tips.title: Skill Enhancement
Tips.description: Suggests active efforts to improve abilities or knowledge in anticipation of an activity.
Tips.example: Her preparation for the recital improved her piano skills dramatically.

Tips.title: Personal Development
Tips.description: May also refer to the personal growth that comes from preparing for life's challenges.
Tips.example: His preparation for fatherhood involved reading many parenting books.

senses.de: Something done to make an event or activity possible or to make it run smoothly
senses.ex: Preparation is the key to a successful party

Tips.title: Smooth Execution
Tips.description: Refers to the arrangement of details to ensure an activity or event proceeds without issues.
Tips.example: The event's preparation included arranging food, music, and seating.

Tips.title: Anticipatory Measures
Tips.description: Involves thinking ahead to what might be needed to avoid future obstacles or problems.
Tips.example: Travel preparation can include learning key phrases in another language.

Tips.title: Goal Setting
Tips.description: Outlines the setting of objectives as part of the planning process.
Tips.example: Her preparation for starting a business involved setting clear goals.

Arrangement.wordDefinition:
An arrangement refers to the organization of something according to a plan or structure. For example, you can make arrangements with a friend to hang out next week.

You can also make arrangements for a holiday by booking flights, accommodation, and tours in advance.

Arrangement involves organizing something ahead of time while preparation involves getting ready for something that will happen in the future.

Forethought.wordDefinition:
Forethought and preparation are similar in that they both involve thinking ahead and planning for the future.

However, forethought refers specifically to the act of thinking ahead and considering the potential consequences of one's actions.

Forethought is applicable when making decisions and weighing the potential outcomes, while preparation is applicable when getting ready for a specific event or situation.

Organization.wordDefinition: Organization refers to the process of arranging things or ideas in an orderly and logical manner to achieve a specific goal.

Plan.wordDefinition:
A plan is a detailed outline of what needs to be done to achieve a specific goal or objective. It consists of steps or actions that need to be taken in order to accomplish something.

Planning involves looking ahead, considering different possibilities, and making decisions about what to do next.

In short, planning is about figuring out what needs to be done and how to do it, while preparation is about getting ready to do it.

Prepare.wordDefinition:
Prepare, on the other hand, means to make something ready or to get it into a suitable state. It is an action that you take in order to prepare for something.

For example, if you are preparing dinner, you might chop vegetables, cook meat, and season the dish.

Preparation is the planning and organizing that is required before an event or activity, while preparing is the physical act of getting something ready.

Provision.wordDefinition:
Provision refers to the act of providing or supplying something to meet a need or demand. It involves ensuring that something is available when required.

Both preparation and provision are important in different situations. Preparation is applicable when planning for something that is yet to happen, while provision is applicable when dealing with a current or immediate need.

Readiness.wordDefinition:
Readiness refers to the state of being fully prepared and equipped to handle a particular situation or take on a specific task.

For example, a soldier being ready to go into battle is an example of readiness.

Preparation is the process of getting ready, and readiness is the state of being ready. Preparation is applicable when planning and organizing, whereas readiness is applicable when executing a task or acting on a specific situation.

Train.wordDefinition:
Train refers to the act of teaching or instructing someone to do something. It involves providing guidance and practice so that someone can develop the skills and knowledge needed to perform a task or job.

Both preparation and train are important in different contexts. Preparation is important when you need to get ready for something, such as a test, presentation, or job interview.

Train is important when you need to learn a new skill or job, such as training for a new job, learning to play an instrument, or practicing a sport.

videos.Text: Otherwise, the egg's escapade ends, and the window for pregnancy closes for that month. Meanwhile, the now empty follicle begins to release progesterone, another hormone that tells the womb's lining to plump up with blood and nutrients in preparation for a fertilized egg that may embed there and grow.

quotes.Text: In Italy, you're in your comfort zone when it comes to language, lifestyle, your habits and preparations, and moving abroad is not easy. It's not easy to carry over your own ideas about football, your own methods. You have to get everything across in a different language, and that wastes a lot of energy.
quotes.Title: Italian Coach
quotes.Name: Antonio Conte

quotes.Text: I kept my speeches short as captain. I focused on the key points of the opposition of the day. As coach, I was never afraid to give long speeches to the players throughout our preparations. It was important they had all the information possible.
quotes.Title: German Athlete
quotes.Name: Franz Beckenbauer

quotes.Text: Wisdom is nothing but a preparation of the soul, a capacity, a secret art of thinking, feeling and breathing thoughts of unity at every moment of life.
quotes.Title: German Novelist
quotes.Name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.Text: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
quotes.Title: American Tennis Player
quotes.Name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.Text: I'm a big believer in the fact that life is about preparation, preparation, preparation.
quotes.Title: American Lawyer
quotes.Name: Johnnie Cochran

quotes.Text: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
quotes.Title: American Philosopher
quotes.Name: John Dewey

quotes.Text: A happy childhood... is the worst possible preparation for life.
quotes.Title: American Singer
quotes.Name: Kinky Friedman

quotes.Text: Life is a long preparation for something that never happens.
quotes.Title: Irish Poet
quotes.Name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.Text: Before important games, I don't change my preparation.
quotes.Title: German Athlete
quotes.Name: Manuel Neuer

quotes.Text: Preparation is very important for me.
quotes.Title: American Basketball Player
quotes.Name: Caris LeVert
